author: newsr.in
title: Assassin’s Creed Syndicate Comes Alive as Bald Eagle Flies Over London - newsR
text: It’s hard to stand out during the crowded autumn launch season and the team at Ubisoft working on Assassin’s Creed Syndicate has decided to launch a major publicity stunt to draw attention to the open-world game, launching a bald eagle over London to bring the Eagle Vision of the title to life. The company has launched the bird from some of the tallest buildings in the capital of the United Kingdom with a 4K camera strapped to its back, creating some of the most impressive ... »
